card.name: A Mind Alike
card.text: Place this card on your avatar when he is in play. You may tap him to look at half the number of opponent's cards in hand at random (either round up if opponent shares your aligment, or round down otherwise). Avatar makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Aglarond
card.text: Playable during the site phase on Glittering Caves, if you have a Dwarf with a mind of 5 or greater at the site. The company faces an attack (cannot be cancelled): Pûkel-creature — 2 strikes with 8 prowess. Tap a Dwarf after the attack or discard this card. All versions of Glittering Caves become a Border- hold [B] and a Dwarf-hold; all automatic- attacks are cancelled for your companies. This site is never discarded and never untaps for you. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Almost Felt You Liked the Forest!
card.graphics: Almost Felt You Liked the Forest.jpg
card.text: Playable on an Awakened Plant attack. The attack is cancelled. Alternatively, playable on an Ent ally: the ally may face strikes from automatic-attacks or attacks keyed to his company's non-Darkhold [D] site, until the end of the turn.

card.name: Always the Black Horses
card.text: Playable on a non-Balrog overt company during site phase at a site in Rohan. The company faces an attack: Men — 4 strikes with 9 prowess. Following the attack, tT tap the site or discard this card. t Alternatively, playable on a company after CvCC, if you have wounded a character controlling a horse ally. tTaTap a character and discard a horse ally of your choice controlled by opponent's wounded character. This card may be stored at a Darkhaven [K] for 2 mp. If stored,tap: take Black Horse, Black Rider or Steeds from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Ambush!
card.text: Playable on a non-detainment hazard creature attack by Orcs, Trolls, Dwarves, Elves, Dúnedain or Men, against a moving company; does not count against the hazard limit. If this is the first attack against the company this turn, attacker chooses defending characters.

card.name: Amon Anwar
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company that can legally move to Rohan. This card is used as a site card: Free-hold [F] in Rohan (draw: 1/1). During the site phase you may tap Red Arrow or discard Oaths You Have Taken from hand (for no effect) to invert this card. If inverted place this card in your mp instead of discarding it: it is worth 1 mp and all your Dúnedain characters may tap to give +2 support to prowess or CC of your Man characters with a home site in Greater Gondor (instead of +1) and vice versa. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

attr.value: Opponent may play as automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature normally keyed to Shadow-hold [S].
When leaving this site, a company may move as if Dagorlad and Rohan were adjacent.
Opponent may play as automatic-attack one non-unique hazard creature with an asterix (*) from his hand, normally keyed to Border-hold [B] or Rohan.
When leaving this site, a company may move as if Dagorlad and Rohan where adjacent.

card.name: Assignment Forsaken
card.text: Fallen-wizard only. Place this card on your Fallen-wizard if he is in play. He may use spirit-magic. +3 to his riddling, offering and flattery attempts. tap: take a light enchantment from your discard pile to your hand. You may at any time discard Honey on the Tongue or Poison of his Voice from hand to tap one non-avatar character (or 2 Man characters) at the same site as your Wizard. Wizard makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

attr.value: Swamp. Hidden site. A company must discard a Lost Knowledge to move to this site. Only non-unique creatures may be keyed to this site.
Swamp. Hidden site. A company must discard a Lost Knowledge to move to this site. Only non-unique creatures may be keyed to this site.

card.name: Baugúr
card.text: Unique. Half-orc. Agent. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 8. +2 EI against Orcs and Orc factions. Agent only: May not move to Free-holds [F] and Border-holds [B].

card.name: Beechbone
card.text: Unique. Ent. Playable at any non-Haven [H] site in Fangorn. If Beechbone is wounded, all other Ent allies inhis company receive +3 prowess and may be attacked by automatic-attacks and hazard creature attacks keyed to sites. Discard Beechbone if his company moves to a site not in: Fangorn, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, or Redhorn Gate.

card.name: Bodyguard
card.text: Unless he is among the starting characters he may only be brought into play at a Hold of your avatar's race (Man if Wizard) or his home site. Bodyguard has the same race as your avatar. Discard Bodyguard if not controlled by a character outside the organization phase; if controlled by a character with 5 mind or more he costs no influence to control. Bodyguard must always be assigned a strike from an attack before a strike can be assigned to his controlling character. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Brought back Alive
card.text: Saruman specific. Playable on an overt company, if your opponent is a white player. All your successful strikes in CvCC do not wound characters. Instead, they are taken prisoner with the company and placed under this card with all non-follower cards they control (discard any allies). This card may be stored at Isengard: it is worth 1 mp for each character and item attached. Opponent may tap a character during the site phase at Isengard to rescue a character stored with this card. For each character placed under this card the hazard limit against the company is increased by 1. If 2 or more characters leave the company (for any reason), or if a character in the company is wounded in CvCC, the characters placed under this card form a company at their current site. Cannot be duplicated on a company.

card.name: Call Your Bluff
card.text: Playable on a non-diplomat character making an influence attempt against a character or follower. Both characters must not have the same home site, and their minds must not exceed 5. +5 to the influence attempt. May also be played during opponent's site phase.

card.name: Captain of the Guard
card.text: Playable on a warrior character at his home site, if you have a unique faction in play that was played at this site. Character receives +1 mind and +1 prowess, and he may tap to take one Incite Defenders, Town Guard or All the Bells Ringing from discard pile to hand. Discard this card if the character moves out of the region of his home site or its adjacent regions.

card.name: Cast aside Regret and Fear
card.text: Spell. Wizard only, and only if your opponent is a Fallen-wizard or minion and his avatar is in play. Playable during the organization phaseon another character in your Wizard's company, or to bring Denethor II or Theoden into play under the Wizard's EI from your hand or discard pile if at their home site. Both avatars must make CC in turn, your Wizard going first. A failed roll only results in tapping the character (ignore any other effects). Repeat until one of them fails, modifying the rolls each round by an additional -1. If your Wizard fails, discard this card. Otherwise, discard any corruption or disease card on target character. +1 to target character's body. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. Wizard makes a CC modified by -3.

card.name: Caught and Found Guilty
card.text: Playable on a face up agent at the same site as one of your companies, after a failed strike or a failed influence attemptor attempt to steal an item by the agent. The agent is taken prisoner and placed “off to the side” with the company. The agent is considered 1 of opponent's characters. You may store this card and the agent at 1 of your Havens [H]. If opponent is a minion player, a Fallen-wizard with more than 10 P, or a Lord of the same race as the agent, he may attempt to rescue the prisoner: tap a character in the company after a successful strike during CvCC or during site phase at the Haven where the prisoner is stored. The agent becomes a character in the rescueing company and this card is discarded.

card.name: Charge!
card.text: Playable on a moving company facing an attack, if all characters in the company control a horse ally and no other allies are in the company (if Shadowfax is in the company, 1 Hobbit need not control a horse ally). You assign all strikes from the attack. The attack's prowess is modified by -1 for every 3 characters and allies that do not get to receive a strike; the attack's body is modified by -1 for every 5 characters and allies that do not get to receive a strike. Alternatively, playable if you initiate CvCC at a Ruins & Lairs [R] and each character in the company controlls a horse ally: + 2 prowess to all your characters.

card.name: Demons of Aglarond
card.text: Demons. 4 strikes. May be played keyed to Glittering Caves or the Gem-deeps. If Doors of Night is in play may also be played keyed to any adjacent Under-deeps site or to Gap of Isen.

card.name: Dernhelm
card.text: Unique. Playable on Éowyn. May also be played in your starting company in lieu of a minor item. +1 to her prowess, body and mind. +1 to her CC if in the company with a Hobbit or character with home site Edoras. You may play Helm of Her Secrecy as if Éowyn were in your hand. Discard this card if Éowyn taps during the site phase, or if Helm of Her Secrecy is in play during the end-of-turn phase.

card.name: Devastation
card.text: Playable on a site on which Siege, Wyrmsiege or Nature's Revenge was in play at the beginning of the movement/hazard phase. Discard above mentioned hazard from the site: any version of the site becomes a Ruins & Lairs [R] and the region containing the site a Wilderness [w]. Replace all automatic-attacks with: Undead — 3 strikes with 7 prowess. Additionally, the site never untaps and is not discarded or returned to the location deck. Discard this card if Rebuild the Town is played on the site or the site becomes a Haven [H]

card.name: Draw Swords Together
card.text: Playable on a hero company. One grey agent may be played as a character with the company at one of your Havens [H]. Place this card with the grey agent when he enters play. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item (reveal this card before playing a grey agent). Alternatively, playable during the organization phase on one of your face up grey agents bearing Deeds of Lonely Daring. Discard Deeds of Lonely Daring; target agent becomes one of your characters.

card.name: Dúnhere
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against the Men of Harrowdale faction and characters with home site Dunharrow.

card.name: Elendil!
card.text: Playable on Aragorn II or Arathorn II, if he bears a weapon and makes an influence attempt or faces a strike. Modify the roll by the prowess bonus the weapon gives him. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn.

card.name: Elfhelm
card.text: Unique. Marshall of the Eastmark. +1 prowess against Men, Orcs and Wolves.

card.name: Ent-moot
card.text: Ritual. Playable during the organization phase on a company that contains an Ent ally and can legally move to Fangorn. This card is used as a site card: Free-hold [F] in Fangorn (you draw: 1, opponent draws: 3). When moving to this site Fangorn is considered a deep Wilderness [ww]. Any resource normally playable at Wellinghall is playable at this site. Place this card in your mp instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Entwives
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Border-hold [B] or non-Dragon's LairRuins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w] that is neither adjacent to a Shadow-land [s] nor Dark-domain [d] and is not in Eriador, Gondor, Mordor or Wilderland if the influence check is greater than 12. Standard Modifications: Ents of Fangorn (+4), for each Ent ally in the company (+2), Wizards (-5). Muster or Threats has no effect on this faction. You may reveal Entwives to your opponent during your movement/ hazard phase to cancel the discard of any Ent allies moving to a site where Entwives is playable. This faction is worth 4 mp if you also havea Man faction in play at a site in the same region as the site where Entwives was played.

card.name: Éothain
card.text: Unique. -1 to influence attempts against factions.-1 to his CC.

card.name: Evermind
card.text: Playable if a character with a home site in Rohan was eliminated this turn. Cannot be duplicated for a givencharacter. Discard this card to discard a corruption card on one of your characters with a home site in Rohan not bearing a ring.

card.name: Eyes of the Tower
card.text: Black player specific. Playable if one of your characters bearsand is able to use a Palantír. Discard this card if these conditions are not met. tap: and discard Messenger from Mordor from hand (for no effect) to name one resource item (two items if opponent also has a Palantír in active play). If the items are in opponent's hand he must immediatly discard them. Alternatively, if your opponent has a Palantír in active play, you may name one of opponent's stored non-special items instead: if you have a manifestation of the item in your hand you may now make an influence attempt against this item (not modified by opponent's EI or mind attribute).

card.name: Fool of a Took
card.text: Unique. Playable on Pippin, if bearing a Palantír. He may tap to use a Palantír he bears. Discard this card if Pippin does not bear a Palantír.

card.name: Freca
card.text: Unique. Agent. +1 EI against the Riders of Rohan and Dunlendings factions.

card.name: Fuel for Furnaces
card.text: Playable on a company containing an overt character at a non-Haven [H] non-Dark-hold [D] site in a Jungle [j] region or in Fangorn, Lotan, Mirkwood, Old Forest or Taur Rómen. The company faces 3 attacks: Awakend Plants — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; 2 strikes with 11 prowess; 1 strike with 14 prowess. These attacks can only be cancelled by discarding a Blasting Fire or Liquid Fire from the company. After these attacks, tap a character and the site or discard this card. If played at a site in Fangorn or Old Forest, invert this card. Cannot be duplicated at a given site. This card may be stored at one of your protected Havens: you may immediatly take a stage resource playable on/at Deep Mines from your play deck or discard pile to your hand. This card is worth 4 mp if stored and inverted.

card.name: Garulf
card.text: Unique. -1 to CC. -1 to influence attempts against factions. +1 prowess if controlling a horse ally.

card.name: Golden Hall of Edoras
card.text: Playable on Edoras. Any character at the site with Edoras as a home site may tap during the organization phase to bring one Horses, Noble Steed, Shadowfax, or Wild Horses from your discard pile to your play deck. Character makes a CC. Discard this card if the site leaves active play or when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Grasping and Ungracious
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-diplomat, non-avatar character. Target character may not transfer or store any items, and no items may be transferred to target character. Cannot be duplicated on a given character. During his organization phase, a character with this card may tap to attempt to remove it. Make a roll: if the result is greater 6, discard this card.

card.name: Greater Specters
card.text: Undead. 2 strikes. Non-unique weapons do not modify. May also be played keyed to any Under-deeps site with an Undead automatic- attack. Unless the attack is cancelled, opponent may play one corruption card (not counting against the hazard limit) from the discard pile on a character who has faced a strike from Greater Specters.

card.name: Grim Morn and a Golden Sunset
card.graphics: Grim Morn and a Golden Sunset.jpg
card.text: Théoden King specific. Place this card on Théoden Kingif he is in play. Any leader may be in his company. Evermind may be played on your horse allies. tap: when you play Hour of Need on a character in Théoden King's company. This card does not untap. If tapped, invert this card when you play Valour in Battle on Théoden King. If inverted, you may place this card in your mp when you play Charge! on the company: it is worth 3 mp and each of your Evermind in play is worth 2 mp. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Grima Wormtongue
card.text: Unique. Man. Manifestation of Wormtongue. 1 strike. Detainment against hero and covert companies. As a creature, may be played keyed to any site in Rohan, Anórien, Gap of Isen, Enedwaith or Dunland. May also be played following an attack by Saruman the Wise. Unless this attack is cancelled or defeated, tap all non-diplomat, non-sage characters in the company. If played as a long-event, all influence attempts at sites in the above named regions are modified by -3.

card.name: Grimbold of Westfold
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. +2 EI against the Men of Westfold faction and characters with home site Helm's Deep.

card.name: Guthláf
card.text: Unique. +2 to his body when in a company with a manifestation of Théoden.

card.name: Gúthwinë
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess(to a maximum of 8). Man or Dúnadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9) and -1 to strike's body against Wolves and Uruk-hai. Éomer only: +1EI.

card.name: Haunted Place
card.text: Playable on a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow- hold [S] in a region affected by Angmar Arrises, Growing Shadow, In Darkness Bind Them or Reaching Shadow. An additional automatic-attack is created at the site: Undead — 2 strikes with 7 prowess. Alternatively, playable on a site with an Undead automatic -attack. That automatic- attack cannot be cancelled this turn.

card.name: He Walks Here and There
card.text: Saruman specific. Saruman may come into play at any Free-hold [F], Border-hold [B] or non-Dragon's Lair Ruin's & Lairs [R] where rings are playable.

attr.value: Men — 4 strikes with 7 prowess (detainment; cancelled if the company contains a character with home site Helm's Deep or Edoras)

card.name: Herugrim
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (to a maximum of 8). Man or Dúnadan warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 9) and -1 to strike's body against Wolves and Uruk-hai. Théoden only: +1 to his body.

card.name: Hew the Stone
card.text: Unique. Playable during the site phase at Isengard, if you have at least 2 allies and/or factions only playable at Wellinghall in play. May not be played if you are a Fallen-wizard or you have a manifestation of Saruman in play. The company faces 3 attacks which cannot be cancelled (Wolves — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; Orcs — 4 strikes with 8 prowess; Flame Traps — 2 strikes with 10 prowess). After the attacks, tap a character and the site to place this card in your mp or discard this card. The Fortress of Isen is discarded and the Fallen-wizard version of Isengard may not be used by any player. If your opponent has more than 1 stage card in play, he must discard 1 stage card of his choice (your choice if your opponent is Saruman). This card can be played regardless of The Fortress of Isen card text.

card.name: Hope Renewed
card.text: Playable on a company during CvCC, if Gates of Morning is in play and at least 2 of your characters are wounded (or taken prisoner). May also be played during opponent's site phase. You may play any number of characters from hand with the company (not counting against the 1 character per turn limit) whose home site is in the same territory as the company's current site. Each of these characters may face a strike already assigned to another character in the company.

card.name: Horn of Eorl
card.text: Unique. Instrument. Playable on Merry at a tapped or untapped Edoras. Cannot be transferred during the organization phase. tap: take one Charge!, Reunion or The Rohirrim from your discard pile to your hand. Ttap: give +3 to an influence check bearer makes against a hero faction.

card.name: Horse Mane's Helm
card.text: Unique. Helmet. +1 to body to a maximumof 9. tap: shuffle a warrior only resource event used by the bearer of Horse-manes's Helm into your play deck instead of discarding it.

card.name: Hurnkennec
card.text: Pûkel-creature. Spider. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. May not be played if the company has already faced a hazard creature this movement/hazard phase; any subsequent hazard creatures keyed to the same site cost 2 against the hazard limit. May also be played at Ruins & Lairs [R] sites in the following regions: Andrast, Anfalas, Anórien, Dunland, Enedhwaith, Gap of Isen, Lamedon, Old Pûkel Gap, Old Pûkel-land, and Rohan.

attr.value: Items (minor, major*) *—Sapling of the White Tree only—

card.name: King of the Dead
card.text: Unique. Undead. 1 strike. Playable keyed to Dunland, Enedhwaith, Gap of Isen, Old Pûkel Gap, or Old Pûkel-land, or at Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions; also playable at Dunharrow or Vale of Erech. Each character wounded by King of the Dead makes a CC modified by -1.

card.name: Last March of the Ents
card.text: Unique. Playable on a company that contains a Hobbit and an Ent ally. taTap a Hobbit and an Ent ally to prevent Entallies in the company from being discarded when moving through The Shire or a Wilderness [w] region that is not listed on their card. Additionally, Ent allies in the company of a Hobbit may face strikes from attacks keyed to a site or from automatic-attacks. Discard this card if there is no Ent ally in the company.

attr.value: Awakened Plant — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters; an Ent in the company may tap to cancel this attack)
Treebeard may be played at this site.
Awakened Plant — 1 strike with 10 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters)

card.name: Lord of the Eorlingas
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Théoden. 2 strikes. As a creature, may be played keyed to Anórien, Enedwaith, Gap of Isen and Rohan and at non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. Detainment against hero and covert companies. As a long-event, any non-Flying company without a horse ally at a site in the above named regions cannot reveal a new site that is not in the above named regions.

card.name: Lord of the Mark
card.text: Unique. Playable on Théoden, Théodred or Éomer. This card must always be transferred to the first character in line in active play, according to the above mentioned order (or discarded if he is in play by opponent). + 2 to bearer's EI and mind. He may automatically influence the Riders of Rohan. + 2 to his EI against factions playable in Rohan, Gap of Isen and Anórien. +1 to his CC as long as there is a character with a home site in Rohan present in his company.This card is worth 1 mp if not on an avatar.

card.name: Lúmeránë
card.text: Playable on a Palantír (except Palantír of Elostirion). If bearer is able to use the Palantír, you may discard a Far Sight or All Thought Bent upon It from hand and tap the Palantír to invert this card. During any of your next turns, you may re-invert this card to either take a resource from your play deck to your hand or cancel the effects of 1 hazard in play (for the rest of the turn). You may not invert this card again the same turn. When you invert this card, bearer must make a CC for every Palantír opponent has in play. Modify such CC by -2 if the other bearer of the Palantír has a higher mind or if your opponent is Sauron. Cannot be duplicated on a given Palantír. This card gives 2 CP to a minion or overt bearer.

card.name: Marshall of the Mark
card.text: Théoden King specific. Playable on Éomer, Elfhelm, Erkenbrand or Théodred, if in the same company as Théoden King. +2 EI against characters with a home site in Rohan. Character becomes a leader (if not already), and can only be controled by Théoden or GI. Attacks against his company keyed to Rohan by name are detainment. Cannot be duplicated on a character.

card.name: Mearas
card.text: Unique. Playable at Edoras or Dunharrow if the influence check is greater than 12.Standard Modifications: Men with a home site in Rohan (+2), each Wild Horses in play (+1), Shadowfax in the company (+3). tap: at any time to tap any horse allies in play by opponents moving through Rohan or at a site in Rohan.

card.name: Meduseld
card.text: Unique. Théoden King specific. Playable on Edoras. May also be played during the end-of-turn phase. The site becomes a Lord-haven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Edoras as their home site may be brought into play under GI at this site (even if none of your companies are at the site). Only agents that have Edoras as a home site may move to this site. Discard this card when the site leaves active play or when Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played at the site.

card.name: Memories of Axe-wielders
card.text: Playable on a company with a majority of Man, Dwarf, Orc and/or Troll characters. All Awakened Plant attacks receive +2 prowess against the company this turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn for a given company.

card.name: Men of Harrowdale
card.text: Unique. Playable at Dunharrow if the infuence check is greater than 7Standard Modifications: none tap: take a horse ally playable at a site in Rohan from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Men of Westfold
card.text: Unique. Playable at Helm's Deep if the infuence check is greater than 7.Standard Modifications: none tap: take a battle-gear item playable at a site in Gap of Isen from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Mensharag
card.text: Pûkel-creature. Animal. 2 strikes. May only be played as the first creature played this movement/hazard phase; all other creatures keyed to the same site cost 2 against the hazard limit. May also be played at Ruins & Lairs [R] sites in the following regions: Andrast, Anfalas, Anórien, Dunland, Enedhwaith, Gap of Isen, Lamedon, Old Pûkel Gap, Old Pûkel-land, and Rohan.

card.name: Mewlips
card.text: Undead. 2 strikes. May also be played keyed to a swamp. Any character wounded by Mewlips must discard a non-ring item (of defender's choice). If Mewlips is defeated, a character in the company may tap to play a minor or major item from hand or discard pile.

card.name: Mighty Steed
card.text: Horse. Playable at any tapped or untapped Border- hold [B]. May not be controlled by a Dwarf, Hobbit, Ringwraith or overt character. tap: cancel a strike (not from an automatic-attack) against itself. If each character in the company controls a horse ally you may move up to 2 additional non-Coastal Sea [c] regions per turn.

card.name: Miraearon
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a company that can legally move to Taur Rómen and discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. This card is used as a site card: Border-hold [B] in Taur Rómen (draw: 2/2). Elves may heal at this site. Wandlimb, Willowshanks and Entwives are playable at this site without further requirements: discard any Man factions you have in play. Place this card in your mp instead of discarding it from play. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Morwen of Lossarnach
card.text: Unique. +3 EI against Théoden and factions playable at her home sites. +5 prowess against Nazgûl and his body is halved (round up).

card.name: Mounted Lance
card.text: Weapon. Dúnadan, Elf, or Man warrior only, if controlling a horse ally: +1 prowess (to a maximum of 8) and +1 to the ally's prowess and body. Discard this item to give -1 body to a strike bearer faces; another weapon may be used against the same strike.

card.name: Old Toby
card.text: Playable on a company at a Ruins & Lairs[R] during the organization phase. Tap a character to take a resource, character or hazard playable at the site from sideboard into hand (show opponent); if a resource, it cannot be normally worth more than 1 mp. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: Orcs of Isengard
card.text: Unique. Playable at Isengard if you have Greater Half-orcs or Sharkû in play and if the influence check is greater than 12.Standard Modifications: a manifestation of Saruman is in the company (+5), Greater Half-orcs (+2). tap: during organization phase to play a Half- orc character from your discard pile under EI at Isengard.

card.name: Out of the Swamps
card.text: Each non-unique Undead creature may be played keyed to a swamp. Additionally, if Doors of Night is in play, each Undead creature playable keyed to a swamp by name or type may also be keyed to the region containing the swamp.

card.name: Panic
card.text: Playable on a company facing a non-detainment Demon, Dragon, Drake or Spawn attack (does not count against the hazard limit). For every ally in the company make a roll (modified by +2 if the ally is unique); if the result plus the ally's mind plus its controlling character's mind is less than the creature's base prowess, the ally is tapped. If the modified result is more than 7 less than the base prowess, discard the ally.

card.name: Power of Persuasion
card.text: Diplomat only. Tap a diplomat during your organization phase at a tapped Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F]. A character in the diplomat's company may make an influence attempt (modified by -3) against a faction at this site during the site phase (even though the site is tapped).

card.name: Proven in Battle
card.text: Playable on a warrior with 2 Valour in Battle on him. He receives + 1 EI and +1 prowess. Additionally, you may immediately play a non-unique, non-hoard minor or major battle-gear item on the warrior, which may be taken from your play deck (shuffle), discard pile or sideboard.

card.name: Refugees
card.text: Playable during the site phase at an untapped Free-hold [F], Border-Hold [B] or Ruins & Lairs [R]. A character may tap to attempt to influence a hero faction normally playable at a site in the same or an adjacent region. If the influence check is successful, tap the site and place this card with the faction (otherwise discard it). The faction is worth 1 less mp. Cannot be played by a Fallen-wizard player.

card.name: Rohir Weregild
card.text: Playable on a company, if a character with a home site in Rohan has been eliminated this turn by an Orc, Troll or Wolf attack. +2 prowess against such attacks and strikes for all characters in the company with a home site in Rohan. Discard this card during the end-of-turn phase if such an attack was defeated by the company or if a character of this type was eliminated in CC.

card.name: Royal Stables
card.text: Unique. Théoden King specific. You may place any horse ally controlled by a character at Edoras “off to the side” with this card during the site phase. If there are at least 3 horse allies under this card, it is worth 2 ally mp. Horse allies may be played at Edoras from this card during the organization phase (character does not need to tap and does not tap the site). Discard this card and all cards attached if Smoke on the Wind or People Diminished is successfully played at Edoras.

card.name: Scion of Eorl
card.text: Unique. Théoden King specific. Each of your unique horse allies are worth 2 mp if not at a Haven [H]. Additionally, your defeated Dragon and Drake creatures are worth full mp. tap: take one Horse-lords from your discard pile to your hand. Horse-lords may also be played keyed to Anduin Vales, Brown Lands, Enedwaith and Dunland.

card.name: Sharkû
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Saruman. Playable on a company if you are Sauron, a Ringwraith or a Fallen-wizard with more than 12 P. You may play sorcery and ring tests with the company (no corruption checks required) and each character in the company may tap to use a Palantír he bears. If a company with Sharkû is at Bag End, you may bring Half-orc characters into play there, the Shire becomes a Borderland [b] and all versions of sites in the Shire become a Border-hold [B].During your end-of-turn phase, discard a character from the company. Discard if Saruman comes into play.

card.name: Skilled Was Their Knighthood
card.text: Atáni-lord specific. Command. Playable on a leader. Return any other command cards on target leader to your hand. -2 to target leader's EI (to a minimum of 0) and he may tap to assign all strikes of an attack (regardless of any character's status or the attack's abilities). Up to 2 strikes may be assigned per character (in separate strike sequences).

card.name: Slew the Great Warrior
card.text: Warrior only. Trophy. Playable during the site phase on an untapped overt or minion warrior, if you have a unique Orcor Troll faction in play normally worth 3 mp; the site must be a Ruins & Lairs [R], Border-hold [B] or Free-hold [F] in the same or adjacent region as where the faction is playable. Character must face an attack: Dúnadan — 1 strike with 13 prowess (cannot be cancelled, redirected or made ineffectual). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Snowmane
card.text: Unique. Horse. Théoden King specific. Playable only on Théoden King at a tapped or untapped non-Haven [H] site in Rohan or Gap of Isen. +1 prowess to all horse allies in his company if Doors of Night is in play. Any More Sense than You played on Snowmane also applies to Théoden King and does not tap either of them. Wound Théoden King when Snowmane is eliminated.

card.name: Son of Éomund
card.text: Unique. Playable on Éomer. May also be played in your starting company in lieu of a minor item. Éomer becomes a leader. If in the company with another character with a home site in Gondor or Rohan: +2 to his mind, prowess and EI.

card.name: Spear Shall Be Shaken
card.text: Atáni-lord specific. Command. Playable on a leader. Return any other command cards on target leader to your hand. -2 to target leader's EI (to a minimum of 0) and he may tap to untap all battle-gear items in the company. Discard this card to untap all characters in the company during CvCC (Cvyou may not cancel attack nor strikes). Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Tauremornalómë
card.text: Each company moving through Fangorn or Old Forest must make a roll: subtract 1 for each character and for each Dwarf and Orc in the company, add 2 for each Ent ally in the company. If the result is less than 5, the company faces an attack: Awakened plant — 3 strikes with 10 prowess. Additionally, each player may use one against the hazard limit to discard one Awakened Plant creature and add one Wilderness [w] to the site path of a company moving through at least one Wilderness [w] or Border-land [b]. A ranger, avatar or Ent ally in the company may tap to prevent this. Cannot be duplicated.Alternatively, discard this card from play (counting as 1 hazard) to tap an Ent ally.

card.name: Terror of Halifirien
card.text: Unique. Animal. Boar. Manifestation of Wild Boar of Everhold. 1 strike. Playable keyed to Rohan and Fangorn. May also be played keyed to Druadan Forest. If this creature is defeated and a Man character has faced 1 of its strikes, he may take it as a trophy; character receives +1EI and +1 prowess.

card.name: The Hand That Gives Us Man's Flesh
card.graphics: The Hand That Gives Us Mans Flesh.jpg
card.text: Saruman or Pallando specific. Tap your avatar during organization phase to play this card from sideboard, if you have Bad Companyin play and at least 6 P. All your overt characters and minion battle-gear items are worth full mp. Any Orcs with a mind equal to or lower than the number of Man or Dúnadan characters borne as a trophy by overt leaders in the company, cost no influence to control when outside a Haven [H]. Your Seize Prisoners are worth full mp and may be played at untapped sites. When you store Seize Prisoners at any of your Havens, you may play a Man or Dúnadan character with a mind less than 6 from hand as a trophy on any of your overt leaders at that site (yielding only trophy mp)) ) p).

card.name: The Muster of Rohan
card.text: Unique. Théoden King specific. Playable if you have 6 or more P, Golden Hall of Edoras and 4 animal factions or horse allies in play. tap: take one man character from your discard pile to your hand during your organization phase or modify an influence attempt by Théoden in Rohan or Gap of Isen by +5. The prowess of automatic-attacks at sites in Rohan is modified by +3.

card.name: The Rohirrim
card.text: Théoden King specific. Playable during the organization phase on a company containing at least one Man leader with a home site in Rohan. There is no limit to the size of the company and the company may contain two leaders (in addition to an avatar leader). Discard if either no character in the company has a home site in Rohan, or if two or more characters do not have a home site in Rohan or Gap of Isen (or if such a character is a leader). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Three Hunters
card.text: Playable on a company containing any manifestations of Aragorn II, Gimli and Legolas. If these 3 characters arein the company and no other characters or allies, the company may move 2 extra regions; additionally, you may play Fellowship on the company (at any site; as if 4 characters were present). Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Théoden King
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Théoden. Leader. First Marshal of the Riddermark. +5 EI against characters with a home site in Rohan. +2 EI against any faction playable in Rohan. When Théoden King is at Edoras you may keep one more card than normal in hand. If an opponent has a company without an agent at a non-Haven [H] site in Rohan during his organization phase you may look at his hand. tap: take Meduseld from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Théodred
card.text: Unique. Leader. Second Marshal of the Riddermark. +2 EI against characters with home site Edoras or Helm's Deep.+2 EI against the Riders of Rohan and Men of Westfold factions. If Théoden is eliminated, all Théoden King specific cards and non-ally cards playable only on Théoden may be transferred and/or played on Théodred.

card.name: Tokens of War
card.text: Diplomat only. Playable on an influence attempt. All battle-gear items (except Wizard's Staff) in the diplomat's company are placed “off to the side”: the influence attempt receives a bonus equal to the combined mp of all items placed aside. The items are returned to their previous bearers if the attempt is successful; they are discarded if the attempt fails. May also be played during opponent's site phase.

card.name: Turukulon
card.text: Unique. Fire-Dragon. May be played at Turukulon's Lair.3 strikes. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Dunland, Enedwaith, Hollin, Misty Mountains - Southern Spur and Redhorn Gate; and to non-Haven [H], non-Free-hold [F] sites in these region.

attr.value: Dunland; Fangorn. Valour in Battle may be played at this site regardless of the requirement to have a faction in play.

card.name: Valour in Battle
card.text: Warrior only. Playable during the site phase on an untapped warrior, if you have a Dwarf, Dúnadan, Elf, or Man faction in play normally worth 3 mp or more; the site must be a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] in the same or adjacent region to where the faction is playable. The warrior must face an attack: Troll — 1 strike with 13 prowess (cannot be cancelled, redirected or made ineffectual). Cannot be duplicated at a given site on a given character.

card.name: Wandlimb
card.text: Unique. Ent. Playable at any tapped or untapped site where Entwives was brought into play. May not be attacked by automatic-attacks or hazards keyed to her site. Discard Wandlimb if her company moves and does not contain an Ent. tap: cancel the effects of a hazard environment that targets her company's current site or region.

card.name: We Must Join with Him
card.text: Black player or Saruman specific. Playable on Isengard, if you have a company there bearing Palantir of Orthanc. Store the Palantír. Isengard becomes one of your Dark- havens [K]. Your companies may contain two Orc leaders. Black player only: your companies may move with starter movement to Isengard from Dol Guldur or Carn Dûm. Discard this card when Isengard leaves active play, or when any opponent has a non-hazard manifestation of Saruman in play.

card.name: We Wants It!
card.text: Reveal My Precious at a site where a company containing Gollum or Stinker is present: Gollum/Stinker immediately attacks a character in the company bearing an item (attacker chooses). After the attack, if the attack was successfull, discard Gollum/Stinker. Otherwise, turn My Precious face down and heal Gollum/Stinker (if still in play).

card.name: What of the Dawn?
card.text: Environment. Playable only on a minion company. Cancel the effects of one environment hazard that targets the company. Alternatively, make a roll to attempt to cancel any one hazard short-event (or permanent event if Skies of Fire is in play) played on the company or an associated entity before it resolves: if the result is greater than 6, the event is discarded.

card.name: Wídfara
card.text: Unique. -1 to his CC. -1 to influence attempts against factions. When Wídfara comes into play you may take one The Wind is Turning to your hand from discard pile or play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Wild Boar of Everholt
card.text: Unique. Playable at the start of the movement/ hazard phase (before any hazards are played) on a company moving through at least 2 Wilderness [ww]. The company faces an attack: Animal — 1 strike with 12/6 prowess/body. If the attack is not defeated, discard this card. Otherwise, ttap a Man character to put this card under his control. No mp are received until this card in stored at a Man-hold.

card.name: Willowshanks
card.text: Unique. Ent. Playable at a tapped or untapped Miraearon. May not be attacked by hazards keyed to her site or automatic-attacks. May not move, unless Cast aside Regret and Fear is successfully played on her (as if on a character). Discard if she moves to a Man-hold or is not in the company of an Elf, Ent or Wizard. tap: take Memories of Axe-wielders from your discard pile to your hand. Wound Willowshanks to wound a Man character at her site (both must make a body check).

card.name: Wolf
card.text: Unique. Agent. +2 EI against the Dunlendings faction.

card.name: Wolves of Isengard
card.text: Unique. Playable at a tapped or untapped Isengard if the influence check is greater than 12Standard Modifications: manifestation of Saruman in the company (+3), remove a character in the company from the game (+7). Any wolf ally in your company at Isengard may be placed with this card during the site phase. For every 2 wolf allies placed with this card, it is worth 1 extra mp and all Wolf attacks keyed to Gap of Isen or Rohan or at sites therein receive +1 strike. During your organization phase you may play any wolf ally under this card on a character at Isengard.
